org.jclif.type
Enum ParameterType

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ParameterType>
      org.jclif.type.ParameterType
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ParameterType>
public enum ParameterType
extends java.lang.Enum<ParameterType>

ParameterType enum defines the different option parameter types supported. Parameter type basically represents the value provided with the option in a command line.

Example: java -jar myapp.jar -f "file.txt" -d ";"

In example above, the options are -f and -d while the parameters are "file.txt" and ";" respectively. Types could be defined as ParameterType.FILE for "file.txt" while ParameterType.STRING for ";".

Author:
Stephen Lou Banal <stephen.banal@gmail.com>
